name: Nymaria
description: A graceful pixie fish that glides through both water and air with ethereal beauty. Its shimmering scales reflect moonlight, and it can weave water and fairy magic together.

ability.name: Aqua Pixie
ability.description: Water-type moves become Fairy-type with 20% power boost. Healing moves restore 50% more HP.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles that may lower the target's speed.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the opponent with it.

moves.name: Tidal Wave
moves.description: A massive wave crashes down on all enemies.

moves.name: Moonbeam
moves.description: Calls down a beam of moonlight. Heals the user for 25% of damage dealt.
